## Triggers

### Encircled numbers 0-50

| Keyword | Replaced |
| ------- | -------- |
| `;o0`   | `â“ª`      |
| `;o1`   | `â‘ `      |
| `;o2`   | `â‘¡`      |
| `;o3`   | `â‘¢`      |

### Negative encircled numbers 0-20

| Keyword  | Replaced |
| -------- | -------- |
| `;no0`   | `â“¿`      |
| `;no1`   | `â¶`      |
| `;no2`   | `â·`      |
| `;no3`   | `â¸`      |
